description:
Sykes is a hot country boy! I love his accent! He has a slow southern drawl and deep voice that will make you melt.
He has also has a hot body, gorgeous blue eyes, and a cock that just keeps on going.
I think the cutest part of this video is I ask him how long his cock is, and he replies that he thinks it is about 6.5 or maybe seven inches. I tease him that most guys err on the side of longer, and surely his dick is 8 or 8.5 long. Regardless, it is more than two handfuls.
If you love nervous straight guys rubbing-one-off for the first time, then you will love the authentic feel of this big-dicked Southern boy!
title: Sykes - Solo
